arts.ttl: James Tarkowski apologised to Liverpool star for 'leg-breaker' tackle in Merseyside derby
arts.sum: James Tarkowski escaped a sending off in last season's Merseyside derby at Anfield despite subjecting Alexis Mac Allister to a challenge that was branded a possible "leg-breaker"

arts.ttl: 'Joining Everton from Liverpool was controversial - the stick I got was horrendous'
arts.sum: Only a handful of footballers have turned out for both Everton and Liverpool and even the success stories can anticipate some stick from fans of the club they leave behind
